name: Watermelon Sangria
description: Blender drinks whirl up quickly and are great for a crowd. They’re best served chilled – prep ahead to allow for chill time. Following Good Food. Real Results.™? Swap a cocktail for dessert to stay on track.
preparation: In blender, purée 6 cups watermelon with cold tea; strain into a large pitcher.
Stir in remaining watermelon cubes, wine, orange juice, lemon, and lime. Refrigerate at least 2 hours or up to 6 hours before serving.
Pour into glasses and top with ice cubes.
tips: Spice it up with sliced jalapeños. Make it a mocktail with cooled steeped Hibiscus Bliss Tea instead of wine.
